definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
Bohai Economic Rim (economic region including Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Liaoning and Shandong)
pinyin: Huan2 Bo2 hai3 Wan1 Di4 qu1

sentences.english: Alliance flight path between Booty Bay and Stormwind goes through a tree.
sentences.chinese: 聯盟從藏寶海灣到暴風城的飛行路線會穿越一棵樹。

sentences.english: This is a new era in Gulf politics and security.
sentences.chinese: 這是海灣地區政治和安全的新時期。

sentences.english: Picture the Bay Bridge in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下舊金山的海灣大橋。

sentences.english: The great majority of earthquakes in this region occur beneath the northern portion of the embayment .
sentences.chinese: 這個地區的絕大多數地震都發生在該海灣北部的下面。

sentences.english: But experts say the plan will temporarily increase the amount of oil flowing into the Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 但專家說，這個計劃將暫時增加油量流進海灣。

sentences.english: The boatman nodded towards the north of the bay with some disdain.
sentences.chinese: 船老大略帶輕蔑神情朝海灣北部點了點頭。

sentences.english: Transit workers in the San Francisco Bay Area are on strike.
sentences.chinese: 舊金山海灣地區的運輸工人舉行罷工。

sentences.english: Hepu gulf is of unique geographical position for pearl's growing.
sentences.chinese: 合浦沿海得天獨厚的海灣是繁衍珍珠的最佳場所。

sentences.english: The Monterey Bay Aquarium shows visitors the underwater life in the bay.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特裏灣水族館向遊客展現了該海灣裏的海洋生物。

sentences.english: Will the US accept Iran as the major power in the Gulf?
sentences.chinese: 美國會認可伊朗作爲海灣地區的一支主要勢力嗎？

sentences.english: The shore line is wooded, olive-green, a pristine cove .
sentences.chinese: 岸邊一帶林木蓊鬱，嫩綠一片，好一個山外的小海灣。

sentences.english: From the peak we could see the big bay of Alcudia.
sentences.chinese: 在山頂上可以看到阿爾庫迪亞大海灣。

sentences.english: The Gulf War has sapped Iraqi vitality badly.
sentences.chinese: 海灣戰爭使伊拉克大傷元氣。

sentences.english: Oceania point will be Malaysia, dry reach second to none in coastal development.
sentences.chinese: 金海灣將成爲馬來西亞依斯干達首屈一指的海濱發展。

sentences.english: Congress is to raise questions about the administration's handling of the post-Gulf War situation.
sentences.chinese: 國會將就政府對海灣戰爭後局勢的處理提出問題。
去戶外母鹿海灣事務部。

definition: Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
